name: Even Aliens Hate Prison
description:
"Even Aliens Hate Prison" is our team's first foray into an angled top-down, pixel art style of game. We wanted to expand our artistic and mechanical skillsets and create a game that served as a double-entendre of this game jam's theme: "You Are Not Alone." We did this by factoring in aliens and the use of multiplayer (via a single keyboard). 

See if you can navigate this prison's winding corridors, free all the alien captives, and avoid the guards as you make your way for the exit.

Controls:

  • Player 1 / Astronaut 
    • WASD to Move
    • Lft-Ctrl to interact with panels and Fire Stun Blaster
  • Player 2 / Slime Buddy
    • Arrow Keys to Move
    • Right-Ctrl to Bloop!

See link for downloadable version for Windows:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sb2nofy9Qh-BIF9s76han8vCjRw39ZEV/view?usp=shari...
